## AssertNotXPathOptions interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface AssertNotXPathOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [checkEvery?](./pentf.assertnotxpathoptions.checkevery.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Intervals between checks, in milliseconds. |
|  [message?](./pentf.assertnotxpathoptions.message.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Error message shown if the element is not visible in time. |
